falsifiable_prediction: Integrin-enriched EVs will increase infarct-border uptake and improve post-MI function versus matched EV controls; blocking integrin engagement will attenuate the effect.
starter_ev_source: EPC or MSC EVs with integrin-focused engineering (e.g., ITGA6/ITGB4 enrichment)
starter_recipient_models: Cardiomyocyte hypoxia-reoxygenation in vitro plus murine ischemia-reperfusion MI in vivo
primary_efficacy_endpoints: Myocardial EV uptake, infarct size, LVEF/fractional shortening, capillary density
mandatory_safety_gates: Fibrosis/EMT markers (COL1A1, ACTA2, TGFB1), pro-migratory/invasion phenotypes, endothelial barrier integrity
minimum_ev_characterization: Particle sizing + count (NTA/TRPS), morphology (TEM/EM), EV markers (CD63/CD81/TSG101), non-EV negative marker (e.g., CALNEXIN)
negative_result_falsification_rule: No significant uptake/function gain over control or emergence of fibrosis/pro-migratory liabilities at efficacious dose.

falsifiable_prediction: Autophagy-modulating EVs will improve cardiomyocyte survival and reduce infarct burden, with loss of benefit when autophagy flux is pharmacologically blocked.
starter_ev_source: iPSC-cardiomyocyte or MSC EVs enriched for autophagy-relevant cargo (including miR-143-3p programs)
starter_recipient_models: Cardiomyocyte stress models plus murine MI or ischemia-reperfusion
primary_efficacy_endpoints: LC3-II/p62 flux, apoptosis markers, infarct size, LV function
mandatory_safety_gates: Excess autophagic flux, mitochondrial injury, maladaptive remodeling
minimum_ev_characterization: Particle sizing + count (NTA/TRPS), morphology (TEM/EM), EV markers (CD63/CD81/TSG101), non-EV negative marker (e.g., CALNEXIN)
negative_result_falsification_rule: No improvement in survival/function, or benefit only at doses causing excessive autophagy/mitochondrial toxicity.

falsifiable_prediction: Stage-timed modulation of EV-associated TGF-beta signaling will reduce adverse remodeling and fibrosis without compromising repair.
starter_ev_source: Conditioned macrophage/MSC or serum-derived EV programs with TGF-beta/Smad modulation
starter_recipient_models: Murine MI remodeling timeline (acute and chronic windows) with fibrosis-focused readouts
primary_efficacy_endpoints: Fibrotic area, p-Smad2/3 signaling, LV function, scar quality
mandatory_safety_gates: Scar instability, impaired wound healing, immune suppression signatures
minimum_ev_characterization: Particle sizing + count (NTA/TRPS), morphology (TEM/EM), EV markers (CD63/CD81/TSG101), non-EV negative marker (e.g., CALNEXIN)
negative_result_falsification_rule: No fibrosis/function benefit, or anti-fibrotic effect accompanied by impaired scar integrity or healing deficits.

falsifiable_prediction: Transient EV-mediated Wnt tuning in early injury will improve angiogenesis and recovery, while prolonged activation will fail safety gates.
starter_ev_source: Adipose- or bone marrow MSC EVs with controlled Wnt/β-catenin activity
starter_recipient_models: In vitro endothelial/cardiomyocyte assays plus rodent MI and large-animal confirmatory model
primary_efficacy_endpoints: β-catenin pathway activation kinetics, angiogenesis metrics, infarct size, LV function
minimum_ev_characterization: Particle sizing + count (NTA/TRPS), morphology (TEM/EM), EV markers (CD63/CD81/TSG101), non-EV negative marker (e.g., CALNEXIN)
negative_result_falsification_rule: No efficacy window separating benefit from proliferation/remodeling liabilities.

falsifiable_prediction: Hypoxia-conditioned HIF-1-enriched EV programs will reduce neuronal senescence/ferroptosis and improve neurobehavioral outcomes.
starter_ev_source: Hypoxia-preconditioned NK-cell or neural stem cell EVs
starter_recipient_models: Neuronal/glial stress systems plus AD/PD model cohorts with longitudinal behavior
primary_efficacy_endpoints: Neuronal survival, ferroptosis/senescence markers, cognition or motor outcomes
mandatory_safety_gates: Pro-angiogenic mispatterning, oncogenic transcriptional activation, systemic hypoxia-response overactivation
minimum_ev_characterization: Particle sizing + count (NTA/TRPS), morphology (TEM/EM), EV markers (CD63/CD81/TSG101), non-EV negative marker (e.g., CALNEXIN)
negative_result_falsification_rule: No neuroprotection versus control or induction of pro-oncogenic/pro-angiogenic programs at active dose.
